author: bunny
content: “Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.” -Buddha

author: bunny
content: “Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.” -Confucius

author: BobbyGuy
content: “The whole secret lies in confusing the enemy, so that he cannot fathom our real intent.” - Art of War

author: BobbyGuy
content: “A bird doesn't sing because it has an answer, it sings because it has a song.” -Maya Angelou

content: This is the best idea ever
